descriptionHtml:
Something for Slim girls lovers :)

Preset is only for UUNP body, just install this file via any Mod manager [NMM, MO], or copy file to your data folder...
Then select this preset in
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/]Bodyslide and Outfit Studio [/url]
build your body, feet and hands...and armors if you like this ;)

[b]Also you should go into Racemenu [in game of course] and change in [Body Scales]
Left and right clavicle to 0.8 - without this...clavicles and shoulders can look weird
Pelvis - 0.95 ﻿[optional]
Waist - 0.95 ﻿[optional]
Spine length (Waist) - 0.5 ﻿[optional]
[color=#ea9999][size=3][color=#ffe599] ﻿Picture is included[/color][/size]

[i]If you have any suggestions, just leave comment[/i][/color][/b]




﻿Requirements:
Bodyslide and outfit Studio [UUNP files]
UNP body and compatible textures
HDT psychics extension [optional but highly reccommended]
Racemenu [optional but highly reccommended] + SKSE
XPMSE

﻿Credits:
Ousnius and Caliente - Bodyslide program
Dimon99 - UNP body
Groovtama - XMPSE
Expired6978 - Racemenu
HydrogensaysHDT - HDT physichs extension
SKSE team
author: tujestem

files.name: SLIM GIRL UUNP PRESET
